game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: The players must navigate through the treacherous jungle and retrieve an ancient artifact hidden within the lost temple.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces and a magical amulet.

task.objective: Navigate through the jungle without getting attacked by hostile creatures.
task.description: The players must use their wits to navigate through the dense foliage and avoid deadly traps.

task.objective: Solve the ancient puzzle to unlock the temple entrance.
task.description: The players must use their problem-solving skills to unlock the ancient door.

task.objective: Retrieve the artifact and escape the temple before it collapses.
task.description: The players must act quickly to retrieve the artifact and escape the temple before it collapses, trapping them inside.
